content: *this cute little egg-laying mammal will protect your hands when handling hot dishes * when made with cotton time yarn and 4 mm hook the potholder is about 29 cm long and 17 cm wide without the limbs you need about 50 grams of color a about 15 grams of color b and small amounts of black and white the finnish version is here 1 1 http //patalappumania vuodatus net/lue/2014/03/vesinokkaelain-patalapun-ohje
